name: [WIP] The Escort
description: A mod that will add The Escort and (eventually) their very special slugpup.<LINE>Thank you Walkfu for the placeholder headshot art (the design is not yet finalized)<LINE><LINE>Currently implements The Escort and some of their abilities and movement tech. <LINE>SHOULD be fully compatible for playing in other campaigns or arena.<LINE><LINE>Feedback of any sort is HIGHLY appreciated!
